metadata.name: Alphaglyphs Font
metadata.description: Here is where the Alphaglyph font begins. The Alphaglyphs typeface is based upon centuries of typographic experimentation and expertise and is now available in picture format. Behold this beautiful selection of 30 golden antique letters in RGB format which can be copied and pasted in Photoshop to create words of your choosing. This token also entitles holder access to a separate OpenType version of the font which can be accessed by download via token-gated web page. This item will also be used for burn mechanisms for redemption opportunities in the future.
